p.span: All schools in Texas have been given an Executive Order by Gov. Abbott that school buildings will remain closed for the rest of the school year. Plains ISD will continue with the distance learning options at this time until we are given more information. Packet and meal pickup will continue on Monday as scheduled.

br.a: Carta de extensión suspendida de la escuela

span.span: Plains ISD serves approximately 470 PK- 12th grade students in a West Texas Town of 1,500 people approximately 70 miles Southwest of Lubbock. Our schools have a tradition of excellence in academics, athletics, and FFA. Plains ISD is an AVID (Advancement via Individual Determination) district and is dedicated to providing quality instruction through engaging instructional practices to prepare our students for college and career readiness. Thank you for visiting our website. More information can be obtained on the district and campus pages. We value your input and would like to hear from you related to information that would be useful on our website.
